course_main_structural_unit.address:
Nooruse 1
50411 Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: This course provides an advanced-level approach to oral conventional and modified-release drug delivery technologies including oral mucosal drug delivery systems, oral sustained and controlled release delivery technologies, and colonic technologies. The course will also provide an insight into the regulatory issues and intellectual property rights in the field of modified-release drug delivery. The present course will be arranged as a book exam.
description.et: Lähtutakse käesoleva hetke Euroopa Farmakopöa ravimvormide klassifikatsioonist ning  selgitatakse toimekestvuse modifitseerimise põhimõttelisi võimalusi ja vajadusi. Kajastamist leiavad järgmised teemad: manustamiskoha füsioloogia, raviaine/abiainete füsikokeemilised omadused, raviaine vabanemise kiirus ja võimalused seda muuta, raviaine imendumiskiiruse reguleerimise võimalused, kasutatavad abiained ja nende funktsionaalsuse tõestamise võimalused, erilised tehnoloogilised võtted, ravimpreparaatide biofarmatseutilise kvaliteedi hindamine.

objectives.en: This course (book exam) aims to provide an advanced  level of knowledge on the formulation challenges and uses of oral mucosal, oral, and gastrointestinal tract drug delivery systems including related regulatory issues and intellectual property aspects.
objectives.et: Selgitada modifitseeritud toimekestvusega ravimpreparaatide disainimist, iseloomustada kasutatavaid abiaineid ja nende funktsionaalsuse kontrollimise võimalusi ning anda ülevaade modifitseeritust iseloomustavatest olulisematest biofarmatseutilistest karakteristikutest.

learning_outcomes.en: The student who has passed the course (book exam):
-	knows oral cavity as the specific site of drug delivery and the principles related to the development of drug delivery systems for the oral mucosal route
learning_outcomes.et: -          Teab suus kasutatavate ravimkandursüsteemide (suu limaskesta kaudu imenduvate ravimkandursüsteemide) disainiks ja valmistamiseks vajalikke suu- ja limaskesta omadusi

learning_outcomes.en: -	knows the technologies and challenges related to the modified-release drug delivery systems designed for the oral route
learning_outcomes.et: -          Teab tehnoloogiaid ja väljakutseid, mis on seotud modifitseeritud vabanemisega suus kasutamiseks mõeldud ravimkandursüsteemidega

learning_outcomes.en: -	knows the novel approaches including e.g. microparticles, new tableting technologies and 3D printing in the development of modified-release drug delivery systems
learning_outcomes.et: -          Teab uudseid tehnoloogiaid/viise, nagu nt mikroosakesed, uusi tableteerimise ja 3 D printimise tehnoloogiaid modifitseeritud vabanemisega ravimkandursüsteemide valmistamiseks

learning_outcomes.en: -	knows the current regulatory aspects related to the marketing authorization of modified-release drug delivery systems
learning_outcomes.et: -          Teab kehtivaid modifitseeritud vabanemisega ravimkandursüsteemide jaoks mõeldud regulatoorseid juhendeid ja seadusandlust ning müügiloa saamiseks vajalikke tingimusi

learning_outcomes.en: -	understand the added value of any developed modified-release drug delivery system (intellectual property aspects).
learning_outcomes.et: -          Mõistab väljatöötatud modifitseeritud vabanemisega ravimkandursüsteemide vajalikkust (intellektuaalse omandiga seotud aspektid).

notes.et: Ainele registreerudes võtta õppejõuga 28-ndal õppenädalal ühendust.

description.et:
Book exam, raamatueksam
The final assessment form is a book exam based on the pre-determined literature (text books). The exam is composed of essay-type questions.
The evaluation scale is from "A" (= the highest mark) to "F" (rejected).
The book exam is passed, if the student gets 51% or more from the maximum points.

grade_preconditions.et: Aktiivne iseseisev töö kirjandusega. Kohustusliku õppematerjalide läbitöötamine.

grade_evaluation.et:
The evaluation scale is from "A" (= the highest mark) to "F" (rejected).
Book exam assessment criteria:
"A" - Answers are at an outstanding level and student shows an excellent knowledge of all relevant facts presented in the exam literature. The student clearly shows that she/he can follow and understand the scientific text and is able to provide also her/his own thoughts and potential development ideas associated with the questions(s) theme area. Answers are logically compiled and grammatically well written without any significant flaws.
"B" - Answers are at a good level and student shows a good knowledge of the relevant facts presented in the exam literature. The student shows that she/he can follow and mostly understand the scientific text and provides some own thoughts and potential development ideas associated with the questions(s) theme area. Answers are mainly logically compiled and grammatically in the correct form.
"C" -The student shows quite a good knowledge of the facts presented in the exam literature. The student shows that she/he can mainly follow and understand the scientific text and has made attempts to give also some own thoughts associated with the questions(s) theme area. Answers are mainly presented by a logical way and grammatically in the correct form.
"D" - The student shows a satisfactory knowledge of the facts presented in the exam literature. The student have some difficulties to present the key issues of the theme area and she/he does not give any own thoughts in the answers. Answers are not very clear, partially not logical, and involve grammatical flaws.
"E" -The student shows only quite a limited knowledge of the facts presented in the exam literature, and there are clear substance-related errors in the answers. The student have difficulties to present the key issues of the theme area and she/he is not able to give any own thoughts in the answers. Answers are quite simplified, unclear, not very logical, and involve grammatical flaws.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

resources.mandatory_materials: Book exam: M.J. Rathbone, J. Hadgraft,  M.S. Roberts and M.E. Lane (eds.), Modified-Release Drug Delivery Technology, Volume I, Informa Healthcare, New York, 499 p. (the 2nd or the latest edition)

Iseseisev töö kirjandusega. Ettevalmistumine raamatu eksamiks. Independet work/book exam.
Ainele registreerudes võtta õppejõuga 28-ndal õppenädalal ühendust.
